entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -21.9°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
